Sentencas: A novel Ag-SiO2 braze for Solid Oxide Cells was successfully developed and applied to join Co coated AISI 441 ferritic stainless steel to YSZ-NiO half cells.
Titulo: Joining of Co coated ferritic stainless steel to ceramic solid oxide cells by a novel Ag-SiO2 braze

Sentencas: The braze showed an improved wettability on the coated steel and the YSZ compared to pure Ag.
Titulo: Joining of Co coated ferritic stainless steel to ceramic solid oxide cells by a novel Ag-SiO2 braze

Sentencas: A defect-free steel/YSZ joint was obtained using an Ag-1SiO(2) braze jointed at 1000 degrees C for 30 min in air.
Titulo: Joining of Co coated ferritic stainless steel to ceramic solid oxide cells by a novel Ag-SiO2 braze

Sentencas: The microstructure of the joints was characterized by scanning electron microscopy and transmission electron microscopy with energy-dispersive X-ray spectroscopy.
Titulo: Joining of Co coated ferritic stainless steel to ceramic solid oxide cells by a novel Ag-SiO2 braze

Sentencas: Furthermore, a Co-Si-O-2 phase diagram was calculated and used to explain the experimental results and formulate a reaction mechanism.
Titulo: Joining of Co coated ferritic stainless steel to ceramic solid oxide cells by a novel Ag-SiO2 braze

Sentencas: It was found, that during the air brazing process, Co3O4 and (Co, Fe)(3)O-4 are formed by the oxidation of the prefabricated Co coating.
Titulo: Joining of Co coated ferritic stainless steel to ceramic solid oxide cells by a novel Ag-SiO2 braze

Sentencas: The growth of Cr2O3 was effectively impeded by the formed Co-based spinels.
Titulo: Joining of Co coated ferritic stainless steel to ceramic solid oxide cells by a novel Ag-SiO2 braze

Sentencas: In a second step, Co3O4 reacts with the SiO2 present in braze.
Titulo: Joining of Co coated ferritic stainless steel to ceramic solid oxide cells by a novel Ag-SiO2 braze

Sentencas: The Co2SiO4 formed by the reaction ensures a firm bonding between the steel and Ag-SiO2 braze.
Titulo: Joining of Co coated ferritic stainless steel to ceramic solid oxide cells by a novel Ag-SiO2 braze
Joining of Co coated ferritic stainless steel to ceramic solid oxide cells by a novel Ag-SiO2 braze
